anonymous1184/GetUrl.description: Get the current URL from a browser window

cyruz/ConfMan.description: Ini files management class, implementing an object central storage and an interface dealing with the underlined classes

cyruz/StdoutToVar.description: Runs a command line program and returns its output

Descolada/Acc.description: Acc library for AHK v2 (note: use of UIA is preferred over Acc)

Descolada/DUnit.description: Alternative unit testing framework to YUnit

Descolada/FileReadLine.description: Read a single line from a file

Descolada/JAB.description: Java Access Bridge library to automate Java applications interfaces

Descolada/Media.description: Implements UWP Media Control, allowing access and control of the playing media (but not any media, only UWP ones that are notified by a tray tip with the play-pause buttons and playing song title)

Descolada/Misc.description: Miscallaneous useful functions such as Range, RegExMatchAll, Highlight, WinGetInfo, GetCaretPos, ConvertWinPos, etc

Descolada/OCR.description: OCR library using Windows' built-in UWP OCR capabilities

Descolada/UIA.description: An AutoHotkey v2 wrapper for the UIAutomation framework, which can be used to automate windows that normally might be difficult or impossible to automate with AHK

Descolada/UIA_Browser.description: An addon for Descolada/UIA library to simplify automating browsers via UIA

Descolada/WinEvent.description: Can be used to monitor for window events such as close, open, minimize etc

evilC/AutoHotInterception.description: AutoHotInterception (AHI) allows you to execute AutoHotkey code in response to events from a specific keyboard or mouse, whilst (optionally) blocking the native functionality (i.e. stopping Windows from seeing that keyboard or mouse event).

scripts.postdownload:
A_WorkingDir := A_Args[1]
Download("https://github.com/oblitum/Interception/releases/latest/download/Interception.zip", "Interception.zip")
DirCopy "Interception.zip", "Interception", true
FileCopy('Interception\Interception\library\x64\interception.dll', 'AHK v2\Lib\x64\interception.dll', true)
FileCopy('Interception\Interception\library\x86\interception.dll', 'AHK v2\Lib\x86\interception.dll', true)
FileMove('Common\Lib\AutoHotInterception.dll', 'AHK v2\Lib\AutoHotInterception.dll', true)
if !(FileExist('C:\Windows\System32\drivers\mouse.sys') && FileExist('C:\Windows\System32\drivers\keyboard.sys')) {
MsgBox('Preparing to run the Interception driver installer.`nReboot your computer after installation.`n`nPress OK to continue', 'Notice')
Run '*RunAs ".\Interception\Interception\command line installer\install-interception.exe" /install'
}
DirDelete('Interception', true)
DirDelete('Common', true)
RunWait 'powershell.exe -windowstyle hidden -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File "' A_WorkingDir '\AHK v2\Lib\Unblocker.ps1"',, 'Hide'
ExitApp
scripts.preinstall: ExitApp(MsgBox('This package requires installing the Interception driver, which requires administrator access and must be used cautiously as not to disable certain key combinations such as Ctrl+Alt+Delete. Are you sure you want to continue?', 'Warning', 'YesNo') = 'Yes' ? 0 : 1)

evilC/InterceptionTapHoldManager.description: A patch for TapHoldManager that allows it to be used with the Interception driver. See main description under evilC/TapHoldManager

evilC/TapHoldManager.description: An AutoHotkey library that allows you to map multiple actions to one key using a tap-and hold system. Long press / Tap / Multi Tap / Tap and Hold / Multi Tap and Hold etc are all supported.
